How to Acquire Cone of Cold

Cone of Cold can be acquired by the following classes: Sorcerer, Wizard, Arctic (Circle of the Land Druid) Hexblade Cone of Cold can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Sorcerer, Wizard, Arctic (Circle of the Land Druid) Hexblade

Cone of Cold Tips & Notes

A target with the Wet condition is Vulnerable to Cold/Lightning damage and will sustain double damage from this spell.

Lvl 5 Spells Banishing Smite ♦ Cloudkill ♦ Conjure Elemental ♦ Contagion ♦ Curricul
